body.name: Rocollos Rechargeable Wall Mounted Lighted Makeup Mirror Chrome, 8 Inch Double-Sided LED Vanity Mirror 1X/10X Magnification,3 Color Lights Touch Screen Dimmable 360°Swivel 13 Inch Extendable
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery on orders over $35 shipped by Amazon.
features: 🔋【Rechargeable LED Wall Mirror】This upgraded wall mounted makeup mirror built-in 1500 mAh rechargeable Lithium battery, Type-C cable is included. No placing batteries needed. The most unique feature is that it's rechargeable so there are no unsightly cords on your walls!

💡【Stepless Dimming &3 Color Lighting】This vanity mirror offers white lights, warm lights and cool lights, you can apply 3 different settings for different light effects, white light for daily office or normal makeup, warm light for party or club makeup , natural light for date or outdoor makeup. Easy to change the light mode by single touch the button and long press to adjust the brightness to meet your need.

😍【8 Inch Double Sided Wall Mounted Mirror】This upgraded lighted magnified mirror is 8 inch large size and double sided with 1X/10X magnification. The high definition 1X lighted mirror for your overall facial makeup. You can change for the 10X magnifying beauty mirror on the back to show details of your face when putting eyeliner, eyebrows,or lipstick, it’s perfect for delicate makeup. Please keep 4 inch distance when use the lighted 10x magnifying mirror to avoid dizzy.

👍【360°Swivel Extendable Design】The lighted wall mount mirror with extendable arm allow you to fix your mirror to the optimal position for perfect viewing. Adjusting the arm to any angle you desire. You can fold the mirror on the wall to save space when you are not using it.

💗【Easy installation】Our bathroom vanity mirror with lights is very simple to install. All installation information you can find in the pictures or in our package. You can use the screws install it. Please make sure all accessories are complete before you start install . The convenient wall-mount base can be mounted to almost any surface by simply screwing.

💝【Perfect Gift & Outstanding Service】Rocollos wall mount makeup mirror is a perfect Christmas Gift for friend family or lover . Rocollos provides 7/7/24 customer services and 12-months warranty. If you have any questions please feel free to contact us! The power of the mirror may not be full when it leaves the factory, so please fully charge it before using for the first time.

🌺【Warm Tips】If there is any chromatic aberration of the vanity mirror, pls contact our customer service 。When using 10 magnifying mirror, keep your face within 4 inch away from the mirror for clearness.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Rocollos Rechargeable Wall Mount Lighted Makeup Mirror Double Sided 1X/10X Magnification with 3 Color Lighting Convenient Type-C charging function: Our makeup mirror built-in 1500mAh rechargeable battery. You can use this led light up mirror wireless after full charged. Indicator lights: Red for charging. Green for fully charged Tips:This makeup mirror has an automatic light-off system. When not in use, the light will be automatically turned off in 30 minutes It can avoid the waste of electricity by forgetting to turn off the light.

Smart Touch Magnifying Mirror our vanity mirror features a high-sensitivity touch screen sensor design : Touch the sensor switch to turn on / off the light. Short touch again to select color lights. Hold the button for a seconds can adjust brightness. 360 ° Free Rotation This bathroom mirror can be rotated 360 degrees, it is easy for you to find the comfortable viewing angle as needed. Chic Extenable Arm The mirror arm can be folded and extended, which is very suitable for use in narrow spaces. Put it back against the wall will be space saving after use.

Double Side 1X 10X Magnifying Mirror One side is a full view 1X lighted mirror reflects your overall makeup, the other side is a 10X magnifying beauty mirror shows details of your face. Suggest Distance: 4 inch Please put your face within 4 inch away from the led 10x magnifying mirror to avoid dizziness. Ideal Gift It's the best gift for ladies and girls in Halloween, Christmas, New Year, Valetine's Day, Mother's Day, Birthday, Party, Performance, Special occasions, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This thing WORKS! Plus it looks really high end!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this thing because as my old bod ages it's getting harder to see what's left of me to shave in the bathroom mirror.. Boyoboy is this thing NICE! It's two sided.. One magnifies a LOT, the other is a standard mirror.. It was easy to install.. The LED lighting is maybe a tad too bright, but after nightly use for a couple of months, (By my wife, who loves it, BTW!), it still hasn't required a charge! And it's really sturdy too! Just make sure you find a stud to screw it on to and you can darned near hang on it! Oh, and did I mention that it looks really classy too? These folks put together a really useful "tool".. We love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a wall mounted mirror what would have regular and magnified mirror and rechargeable light. This mirror is perfect, it’s not too small or too big, super easy to install, the joints are easy to move without feeling too wobbly or loose and the light lasts long and charges fast! I also like that it has 3 color temps and it’s dimmable. Couldn’t ask for more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great! Works great! Wife is happy!
reviews.reviewText: Looks great and takes another item away from countertops. Easily mounted to wall. Light circles the glass. Can change colors. Turn the mirror over and it’s a 10x zoom mirror. On a swivel arm to make it easy to do your makeup or whatever. Well worth the $.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not 100% the quality I was looking for, but not bad at all for the price
reviews.reviewText: Convenient since I am no electrician and didn't have to wire this in. I was able to easily attach it to the wall, close enough to an outlet to use the short charger cord that came with it. The magnifying side is not the greatest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Bought a similar item a month ago for my wife, and the battery wouldn't hold a charge. Returned it and bought this one. Much better quality and works as advertised. Battery charges properly and holds a charge. So far it's been great, AND it's a few dollars cheaper than the junk brand I originally purchased.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bath vanity mirror with a light.
reviews.reviewText: I like this vanity mirror with the light as it is bright and has 10x magnification. Easy to install and looks very nice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Attractive and well made.
reviews.reviewText: Mirror looks good and appears to be well made. The light works well and rechargeable is a good feature. Durability is unknown but no problems so far. Installation is fairly simply.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is perfect. It's well made and was easy to install, easy to use and charge. My only complaint is we hung the mirror higher because of the wall space we had to work with and now the mirror is distorted because of it. We will relocate once we have time to patch the wall from the screws and paint. ***Please pay attention to the height this is hung to prevent this from happening to you!

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice features. Eeasy to install. Works great.

reviews.reviewText: Love it! Better than I expected. Clear, bright, sturdy. Very happy.
This magnifying mirror is excellent when applying my makeup. I like the different shades of light. It has been over 2 months since it was first charged, & I haven’t had any issues with it since.
Easy to install and love the cordless operation.
I have this for a while now. It's very useful, easy to install . Charge also last a good time...
